reviewText: Some of the dated video effects are corny but it has good info. It could use media updating if they want video retail price.
All of these videos are VERY helpful to new RV'ing.  You can only remember so much during a walk through and these help a lot.

This is a good dvd for all us newbies that just bought a camper and never had one before. Makes you aware of the things that you might scratch your trying to figure it out. Or you could just go your own and go fry your electrical system or let your black water holding tank freeze up.....you know.....stuff like that.
